title: Visa denial notices
dataVerified: Full name, case number, denial reason/INA section, denial date, consular officer
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Denial status (confirmed). Link to embassy/USCIS system (applicant and immigration attorneys, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake denial notices. Domain binding verifies embassy/USCIS. Appeal/waiver documentation. 214(b)/221(g) verification. Reapplication planning. Prevents denial fraud. Uses SHA-512 (privacy).
